name: Monster Hospital (itch)
description:
The hero is up to good again, but we'll put a stop to it! In Monster Hospital, you take on the role of placing buildings and healing monsters to fight back against the hero.

Goal: Place Healing huts and haus down to place your monsters into. Then roll your dice, select a building with a monster in it and heal them until they are ready to be discharged. Don't let all your monsters die - the hero is looking to destroy the hospital.
